title: Sword of the Stars The Pit & Mindgames DLC 1.1.4.1
description:
This is: Sword of the Stars The Pit & Mindgames DLC 1.1.4.1

Yeah sooooo, I got The Pit in a bundle, so I decided to grab the Mindgames DLC off GamersGate. Turns out what I got (from GamersGate) was The Pit ALONG WITH the Mindgames DLC all in one package/installation. No biggie, though. The game's a legit roguelike. Check it if interested!
--------------------------------------
